attributes.action: Allow driving lessons if a driving test is booked
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to make this change because it will affect many people who already have their driving test booked. Trying to reschedule then for a later date wouldn’t be fair. Especially with some on furlough right now, it would be the perfect time to go for one to one lessons if the driving test is booked.
attributes.background: I want the government to allow people whom have a driving test booked to continue driving lessons so they are able to do there driving test on the date they have booked.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
